nodes.text: Cat and Mouse is a miniadventure by Eric Cagle for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game book Ultimate Adversaries. The adventure was made freely downloadable at Wizards of the Coast's Star Wars website.

The gambler Kelna Toodo has come into possession of a starship with a rare Corellian sand panther. Desperate to escape his servitude with Beeda the Hutt, he sets a plan in motion to have the sand panther hunt group of spacers.
